biweekly.io

Class DataModelConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • biweekly.io.DataModelConverter

  • public class DataModelConverter
extends Object
    Converts various properties/components into other properties/components for vCalendar-iCalendar compatibility.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

        public static VTimezone convert(List<Daylight> daylights,
                Timezone tz)
        Converts vCalendar timezone information to am iCalendar VTimezone component.
        Parameters:
        daylights - the DAYLIGHT properties
        tz - the TZ property
        Returns:
        the VTIMEZONE component

      • convert

        public static DataModelConverter.VCalTimezoneProperties convert(VTimezone timezone,
                                                List<Date> dates)
        Converts an iCalendar VTimezone component into the appropriate vCalendar properties.
        Parameters:
        timezone - the TIMEZONE component
        dates - the date values in the vCalendar object that are effected by the timezone.
        Returns:
        the vCalendar properties
